visual.name: criticalPathVisual
visual.description: Displays the critical path (longest path) of tasks using CPM analysis.

dataRoles.name: duration
dataRoles.description: Task duration in work days for CPM calc

dataRoles.name: taskName
dataRoles.description: Name or description of the task

dataRoles.name: relationshipLag
dataRoles.description: Lag or lead time (negative lag) for relationship in work days

dataRoles.name: tooltip
dataRoles.description: Additional fields to display in tooltips

showConnectorToggle.description: Show or hide the connector lines toggle button in the header

elbowOffset.description: Controls the distance of connector line bends

traceMode.description: Select whether to trace critical path backward to or forward from the selected task

fontSize.description: Base font size for finish dates and duration text

taskNameFontSize.description: Font size for task names in the left margin

labelColor.description: Color for task name and date labels

showDuration.description: Display calculated CPM duration text inside task bars

showFinishDates.description: Display finish date labels next to tasks/milestones

dateBackgroundColor.description: Set the background color for finish date labels

labelColor.description: Color for month labels (defaults to line color if unset)

labelFontSize.description: Font size for month labels (defaults to general font size if 0)

show.description: Show the vertical line indicating latest finish date

lineColor.description: Color of the project end line and label

lineWidth.description: Width of the project end line

lineStyle.description: Style of the project end line
